findings.recommendation: Expand beyond 5E to include UbD (Understanding by Design) and ADDIE protocols for institutional users.
Implement inline 'conversational refinement' to allow educators to edit lesson plans via chat.
Render Google Search grounding chunks as a dedicated 'Teacher Reference Pack' with thumbnail previews.

roadmap: Gemini Live API Integration for Real-time Voice Lesson Brainstorming
Multi-Agent Collaborative Workspace (Admin + Lead Teacher + AI Designer)
Global Curriculum Cross-Mapping (e.g., Sindh Board to Cambridge IGCSE Alignment)
